issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

comments.body:
Hello!
I believe this is known issue. As of Titanium 8.0.0, Java property get/set methods are deprecated. Calling a property getter or setter method still works.Please access the property in standard JS style. 
Thanks
